items.sentence: It seems that Tom doesn't really care what happens.
This is the third time this week Tom has done that.
There were three Canadians at the party last night.
Are you saving money to buy something? If so, what?
Tom owns a barbecue restaurant with his wife, Mary.
We'll still be able to make it on time if we hurry.
I wonder whether Tom will ask me to do that or not.
Tom didn't know that Mary wouldn't be at his party.
Tom's doctor advised him to stay in bed for a week.
Everybody has to help do this if we are to succeed.
